title: VCK DEMONSTRATORS ASSAULT A MOTORIST VICIOUSLY FOR ASKING WHY DELAYING TRAFFIC
content: VICIOUS ASSAULT: The group attacked a motorist on Friday, who asked them why they were holding up traffic. Photo: V. Ganesan Onlanka News – by Walter Jayawardhana Members of Viduthalai Chiruthakal Katchi (VCK) an ally of Vaiko violently attacked  a motorist, according to photos and videos published, near the Sri Lanka Deputy High Commission in…
